lead_paragraph: Brazil's two biggest cities on Sunday inaugurated mayors who are political outsiders and whose victories underscored deep frustration with the political class and public corruption.
snippet: Brazil's two biggest cities on Sunday inaugurated mayors who are political outsiders and whose victories underscored deep frustration with the political class and public corruption....

headline.main: Fed Up With Politics, Brazil Cities Swear in Outsider Mayors
headline.print_headline: Fed Up With Politics, Brazil Cities Swear in Outsider Mayors
